attributes.action: Shut all schools in hull and East Riding
attributes.additional_details: Shut the schools to stop the virus spreading
attributes.background: We have the highest rate of infection the schools need to close

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to close schools in areas with the highest rates of Covid-19 transmission, but couldn't accept a petition calling for schools in a particular area to be closed, as that is not how the Government is taking decisions in relation to Covid-19.
